dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Brian Whitman
Paul Lamere
dcterms:description: Amazon Book is a dataset collected from Amazon, which contains 517,556 ratings to 170,474 books given by 4,621 users. The sessions are extracted using a time gap threshold of 2 days.
dcterms:title: Amazon Book

dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Brian Whitman
Paul Lamere
dcterms:description: Amazon Video is another dataset collected from Amazon, which contains 64,298 ratings to 12,434 videos given by 1,709 users. The sessions are extracted using a time gap threshold of 2 days.
dcterms:title: Amazon Video

dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Brian Whitman
Paul Lamere
dcterms:description: MovieLens-1M is a user-movie dataset collected from MovieLens website, which contains 970,346 ratings to 3,692 movies given by 5,492 users. The time gap threshold is set to 2 hours.
dcterms:title: MovieLens-1M

dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Brian Whitman
Paul Lamere
dcterms:description: Lastfm is a freely-available collection of audio features and metadata for a million contemporary popular music tracks, consisting of tuples of user, timestamp, artist, and song listened to. The sessions are extracted using a time gap threshold of 2 hours.
dcterms:title: Lastfm
